'''Elemental Monuments''', sometimes colloquially referred to as '''Elemental Totems''', are small totems that are activated upon striking them with the element indicated on them. This includes [[Talents]] and [[Elemental Reactions]].

Some elemental monuments are permanently lit up upon activating them once, while others are only temporarily activated and will deactivate after a certain amount of time.

Oftentimes, elemental monuments are used to reveal hidden chests or unlock domains.
